  \AddToShipoutPicture{%
    \setlength{\unitlength}{1mm}
%%% EDIT WORKSHOP CHAIRS AND WORKSHOP TITLE %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
    \put(105,17){\makebox(0,0){\footnotesize {\em Proceedings of the 46th Annual Meeting of the ACL},
	\ifthenelse{\equal{#1}{#2}}{page #1}{pages #1--#2},}}
    \put(105,14){\makebox(0,0){\footnotesize Columbus, June 2008. \copyright 2008 Association for Computational Linguistics}}
  }
}
